title: Lakshmi Kasu Haaram with Emerald and Diamond Brilliance
materials: and Fine Green Beads; Hyderabadi Polish
features: This exquisite Kasu Haaram features meticulously crafted Lakshmi coins (Kasu) intricately arranged and interlinked with delicate diamond floral motifs. The centerpiece is adorned with a stunning emerald surrounded by a halo of brilliant-cut diamonds. The necklace gracefully incorporates strands of fine green beads held together by diamond clasps, adding a touch of color and sophistication. The gold work showcases traditional Telugu craftsmanship with a contemporary twist.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranti
or significant family celebrations. Ideal for brides
or anyone wanting to make a statement with traditional elegance.
description: This Kasu Haaram embodies the rich cultural heritage of South India. The Lakshmi coins symbolize prosperity and good fortune, making it a truly auspicious piece. The combination of emeralds, diamonds, and gold creates a captivating visual appeal. Crafted with exceptional attention to detail, this heirloom-quality necklace is designed to be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting, radiant finish.
